thread.title: BRIEF-Volkswagen says close to 700,000 cars affected by illegal software in Spain
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Volkswagen says close to 700,000 cars affected by illegal software in Spain | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Volkswagen says close to 700,000 cars affected by illegal software in Spain
text:
Sept 30 Volkswagen Ag
* Says 683,626 cars in Spain are affected by the illegal software at the centre of the emissions scandal
* Says 257,479 vehicles were sold under the Volkswagen brand, 221,783 under SEAT brand, 147,095 under Audi brand, 37,082 under Skoda brand and 20,187 under Volkswagen commercial brand. Further company coverage: (Madrid Newsroom)
